---
title: "Augementing the_best.rds"
output: 
  pdf_document: 
    fig_height: 7
---


Adds MSL slope as a column to the_best.rds for use my the map-maker code.
 

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
# Load package
library(readxl)
setwd("~/WORKSHOP/ESBJERG2/PUBLICATION/")
best <- readRDS('OUTPUT/the_best.rds')
# Read XLSX into a data.frame
df <- read_excel("DATA/MSLslope_Table.xlsx")
#
merged <- merge(best,df,by="filename",all=TRUE)
#
saveRDS(merged,'OUTPUT/the_best_merged.rds')
```
